_header: Ye men that wisdom will learn
Note: For other MSS with a Prologue of 22 lines see 114; for MSS without a Prologue see 5125.
_description: Prognostics for the year according to the day on which New Year falls — 174 lines in couplets, including a Prologue of sixteen lines and sections for each day of the week.

BLHar2252.First Lines:
ye men þat wysdome wyll lerneye moste lystyn a
                    stevyn…
BLHar2252.Last Lines:
…Thys wysedom of these vii dayesComyth of truþe as
                    Eȝechyas sayes
